item.title: Take AI Capabilities with a Grain of Salt
item.description:
You’ll see people claiming these models can reason all over social media. Watch out for motives. The companies who create these things are tryinging to sell you their service. It’s the same for those who are attracting eyeballs or selling themselves as experts. It’s important to know the capabilities of these models if you’re going to put them to serious use.

item.title: Going Nuclear
item.description:
From Zerohedge

The big tech companies are betting on nuclear. This will be an interesting development to check into. It has always been difficult to cut through the noise of nuclear vs renewable. Renewable energy people high high conviction and they make a lot of noise. Nuclear has no such champions, until now. Money talks, and it’s talking to nuclear.
